summary: Makes the ultra-rare (when used with Morrowloot) Daedric gear (slightly) more powerful than the craftable Dragonbone gear.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Morrowloot Daedric++[/b]
by wavion

This simple mod slightly improves the damage/armor stats of Daedric gear in order to make it better
than the Dragonbone gear. It is a standalone mod, but is intended to be used in conjunction with
Morrowloot or Morrowloot 4E, which makes Daedric gear uncraftable and a single set is scattered
throughout the world. This makes it worthwhile to seek out this Daedric gear, as it is now
better than the craftable Dragonbone gear.

Get [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50740]Morrowloot 4E here[/url].

or the original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44212]Morrowloot here[/url].

Installation:
Extract the esp into your Skyrim data folder and activate the esp through your mod manager. Load it after any mods that alter weapon stats.

Changes Made:
-------------
[code]
Daedric Armor: Before Now Dragonplate*
Armor: 49 55 46
Boots: 18 20 17
Gauntlets: 18 20 17
Helmet: 23 25 22
Shield: 36 40 34
*note that Dragonplate armor is lighter than Daedric, so it was originally closely matched with Daedric

Daedric Weapon: Before Now Dragonbone
Dagger: 11 13* 12
Mace: 16 20 17
Sword: 14 18 15
War Axe: 15 19 16
Battleaxe: 25 30 26
Greatsword: 24 28 25
Warhammer: 27 32 28
Bow: 19 22 20
Arrow: 24 25 25
*Speed also slightly increased from 1.3 to 1.2
[/code]
author: wavion
